title: November 19, 2024—Hotpatch public preview KB5046696 (OS Build 26100.2240) - Microsoft Support
text:
November 19, 2024—Hotpatch public preview KB5046696 (OS Build 26100.2240) 
Applies To 
Windows 11 Enterprise LTSC 2024 
You’re invited to try Microsoft 365 for free 
Unlock now 
Release Date: 
11/19/2024 
Version: 
OS Build 26100.2240 
For information about Windows update terminology, see the article about the  
types of Windows updates 
 and the  
monthly quality update types 
.  For an overview of Windows 11, version 24H2, see its  
update history page 
. 
Note  
Follow  
@WindowsUpdate 
 to find out when new content is published to the Windows release health dashboard. 
Improvements and fixes 
This security update includes quality improvements. Below is a summary of the key issues that this update addresses when you install this KB. If there are new features, it lists them as well. The bold text within the brackets indicates the item or area of the change we are documenting. 
This update makes miscellaneous security improvements to internal OS functionality. No additional issues were documented for this release. 
If you installed earlier updates, only the new fixes contained in this package will be downloaded and installed on your device. 
How to get this update 
Before you install this update 
Microsoft now combines the latest servicing stack update (SSU) for your operating system with the Hotpatch update. For general information about SSUs, see  
Servicing stack updates 
 and  
Servicing Stack Updates (SSU): Frequently Asked Questions 
. 
If you are using Windows Update, the latest SSU will be installed with this update. 
Install this update 
To install this update, use one of the following Windows and Microsoft release channels. 
Windows Update 
Catalog 
Server Update Services 
Available 
Next Step 
Yes 
None. This update will be downloaded and installed automatically from Windows Update. 
Available 
Next Step 
No 
To get the standalone package for this update, go to the Microsoft Update Catalog website. 
Available 
Next Step 
No 
See the options above. 
File information 
For a list of the files that are in this update, download the  
file information for cumulative update 5046696 
. 
For a list of the files that are in the servicing stack update, download the  
file information for the SSU (KB5047621) - version 26100.2303 
. 
SUBSCRIBE RSS FEEDS
summary:
KB5046696 is a quality improvement update released on November 19, 2024, for Windows 11 Enterprise LTSC 2024 (OS Build 26100.2240). This update addresses miscellaneous internal OS functionality enhancements, with no documented security vulnerabilities or bugs reported. It is essential to note that this Hotpatch update couples the latest servicing stack update (SSU) and requires that previously installed updates be present for successful deployment. Installation can be performed via Windows Update, Microsoft Update Catalog, or Server Update Services, with automatic download and installation from Windows Update as the preferred method.

**Technical Breakdown**

**Vulnerabilities and Exploits**:
- This update does not address any high-impact or low-impact vulnerabilities; it solely includes quality improvements related to internal OS functionality.

**Installation Process and Prerequisites**:
- Before installing KB5046696, ensure that prior updates are installed as only new fixes will be applied.
- Preferred update channels for installation:
  - **Windows Update**: Automatic installation; no further action required.
  - **Microsoft Update Catalog**: For standalone installation, download manually.
  - **Server Update Services (WSUS)**: Manage through existing WSUS infrastructure.

No uninstallation instructions were provided in the KB article. If you need to manage installations, scripts are not applicable as this update is managed through standard Windows Update mechanisms.
